title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2657.11 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2657.11 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) No charge will
be made to inspect a record, certify a record or to certify a denial of a
request for a record and the reason therefor. (b) A charge will be made of 25 cents per
page for photocopying of pages that are not larger than 9 inches by 14 inches. There will be no charge for the first five pages. (c) Charges for materials or services not in
paper format shall be based on the actual cost to the division. (d) Payments for copy charges or charges for
other materials or services shall be made by check or money order payable to

New York State Division of Housing and Community Renewal. (e) The requestor shall be notified of the
amount of the fee. (f) Payment must
be received by the division prior to obtaining copies of the responsive
records. (g) If payment is not
received within 30 days of the notification issued pursuant to subdivision (e)
of this section, the request for this information will be considered
withdrawn. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2657.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
